hooked.controller.basic.tooltip.controls: Press '%1$s' to fire hooks. Jump to retract all hooks.
hooked.controller.flight.tooltip.control: Press '%1$s' to fire hooks. Sneak and double jump to retract all hooks.
item.hooked.diamond_hook.tip: Plenty of hooks, plenty of speed.
item.hooked.iron_hook.tip: Allows floating midair by firing two hooks at opposing points.
item.hooked.wood_hook.tip: A simple solution to escaping ditches and climbing trees.
